entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 11:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 8:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
